newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Chittenango CSD, N.Y..

text.p: SUMMARY NOTICE OF BOND SALE
Chittenango Central School District
Madison and Onondaga Counties, New York
School District (Serial) Bonds, 1997
(BookEntry Only) (Bank Qualified) (Callable)
Sealed proposals will be received and considered by the undersigned President of the Board of Education of
Chittenango Central School District, Madison and Onondaga Counties, New York, at the Office of Willkie Farr
&Gallagher, 900 Third Avenue, 17th Floor, New York, New York 10022, until 2:00 o'clock P.M., Prevailing Time,
on the 16th day of June, 1997,

at which time and place the bids will be opened, for the purchase IN FEDERAL FUNDS at not less than par and accrued interest of $4,125,000 School District (Serial) Bonds, 1997, of said School District, dated June 25, 1997, with interest thereon payable on December 15, 1997 and semi-annually thereafter on June 15 and December 15, and maturing June 15 as follows:
Year Amount* Year Amount* Year Amount*
*Subject to adjustment by the District to accomplish level debt.
** callable maturities

THE SCHOOL DISTRICT RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CHANGE THE TIME AND/OR DATE FOR THE OPENING OF BIDS. NOTICE OF ANY SUCH CHANGE SHALL BE PROVIDED NOT LESS THAN 24 HOURS PRIOR TO THE TIME SET FORTH ABOVE FOR THE OPENING OF BIDS BY MEANS OF A SUPPLEMENTAL NOTICE OF SALE TO BE TRANSMITTED OVER THE THOMSON MUNICIPAL NEWS (FORMERLY KNOWN AS MUNIFACTS WIRE).

Each bid, accompanied by a $82,500 good faith check, must be for all of said $4,125,000 bonds. The award will be made based on net interest cost. The purchaser will be furnished without cost, the unqualified legal opinion as to the validity of the Bonds of Willkie Farr &Gallagher, New York, New York, Bond Counsel.

Bidders must refer to the complete Notice of Sale for the terms and conditions of the sale. To obtain copies of the complete Notice of Bond Sale, Bid Form, and the Official Statement of the School District, please contact Fiscal Advisors &Marketing, Inc., Telephone (315) 699-7912,
telecopier: (315) 699-8833. Additional Official Statements may be downloaded from Fiscal Advisors &Marketing, Inc's Internet address: http://www.fiscaladvisors.com. Dated: Chittenango, New York,
June 4, 1997
Francis S. Park
President, Board of Education
(From The Bond Buyer)
